requiredbulletpoints.bulletpoint: Designer, builder, and driver of sport combat robots, as well as shop owner for robotics and electronics tools and components.

bulletpoints.bulletpoint: Developed a robot named Two Factor Annihilation with Steam Deck integration for real-time telemetry and control, achieving 2nd place at debut, impressing robot combat enthusiasts.

Pioneered semi-autonomous combat robotics with advanced sensor feedback, proving viability of 'smart' controls in live events. Integrated adaptive controls that modify based on sustained damage, keeping performance optimal mid-battle.

Integrated real-time 3D orientation views and audio impact feedback via Steam Deck, enhancing combat robotsâ€™ performance monitoring, earning recognition and a feature interview in a major robotics channel
Achieved efficient combat robot fabrication by managing CNC, laser-cut, and 3D-printed parts with advanced materials like carbon fiber nylon, UHMWPE, titanium, and AR500 steel.

Increased ESC reprogramming efficiency with a custom breakout board, reducing setup complexity and improving usability in the robotics community, adopted by major robotics shops, generating thousands of dollars revenue and community acclaim.

Started the Grey Skies Automation shop to meet demand for custom robot parts/tools initially designed for personal projects, resulting in thousands in sales and expanded distribution to additional sites.
